meanings.definition: Of or relating to a corporation.
meanings.sent1: The corporate office handles all the paperwork for the company.
meanings.sent2: The corporate logo is displayed on all our products.
meanings.sent3: The corporate retreat turned into a fun team-building exercise.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership style was like a corporate machine, efficient and structured.
meanings.sent5: The corporate culture promotes collaboration and innovation.

meanings.sent1: The corporate structure allowed for better organization within the company.
meanings.sent2: The corporate entity was established to manage the business operations.
meanings.sent3: The corporate makeover transformed the small business into a thriving corporation.
meanings.sent4: Their partnership was a corporate success story, growing from a startup to a multinational corporation.
meanings.sent5: The corporate expansion led to increased market share and profitability.

meanings.definition: United or combined into one body.
meanings.sent1: The corporate team worked together to achieve their goals.
meanings.sent2: The corporate merger brought two companies under one umbrella.
meanings.sent3: The corporate picnic was a chance for all departments to come together and relax.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was so strong, it felt like a corporate bond.
meanings.sent5: The corporate unity among employees created a positive work environment.
